---
name: Doc Improvement
about: Suggest an improvement to docs/onboarding
title: "[Docs] "
labels: docs, no-code
assignees: ""
---

## Doc Path

Example: `aerovista_offer_pack/app/README.md`

## Problem

What is confusing, missing, or outdated?

## Proposed Improvement

What should change?

## Reader Type

Who is this for?
- New contributor
- Non-coder
- Maintainer
- Client/internal stakeholder

## Acceptance Criteria

How will we know this is done?

## Optional Evidence

Screenshots, copy draft, or example wording.
